key_events.description: The latest dividend per share was R$1.3, with an ex-date of February 03, 2026, and a payment date of February 13, 2026. The current dividend yield is 14.66%.
A 12th share issuance occurred, raising R$ 1.36 billion (December 10, 2025).
The fund announced the closing of its 14th issuance of shares, with a fundraising of R$175 million (December 15, 2025).

risk_factors: Lack of specific vacancy rate data.
Absence of recent cap rate information.

investment_thesis.bull_case: High dividend yield of 14.66% may attract investors.
investment_thesis.bear_case: Trading above book value may indicate overvaluation.

summary_markdown: KNCR11's latest dividend is R$1.3 per share (ex-date: February 03, 2026, payment date: February 13, 2026), with a current dividend yield of 14.66%. The fund completed its 12th share issuance, raising R$ 1.36 billion (December 10, 2025). The 14th issuance of shares closed, raising R$175 million (December 15, 2025). KNCR11 is trading above its book value.
